Articles.Content:
Yes, it's back! And better than never before! The KEGWAY! Version 2.0!

You loved [the original](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95544-The-Kegway-Yes-a-Kerbal-Segway!), well, now it's improved because of Beta Than Ever

You can thank AMD for the delay. Thanks, AMD! Well, at least I get decent frames now.

All is within the video:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wj2GieUas8o?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Also, I'm baaaaaaaaaaaack too!

Craft File:

[FTP Server by FIST](ftp://waterlubber.ddns.net:23456/Finished%20Crafts/Kegway2-0/Kegway%202_0.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T01:46:19Z" title="04/16/2015 01:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by waterlubber**

It was so stupid I couldn't stop laughing ...

Got to send that on Duna.

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

We need more Monty Python silliness!

And this is proper silly!

Repeating the video, just for the music.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T08:31:48Z" title="04/16/2015 08:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by Azimech**
Yes, I can provide more silliness for anyone who wishes for it. Suggest something and I'll make it!
